arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Brighton predictions: Expect goals at Stamford Bridge
arts.sum: Neither Chelsea or Brighton have been particularly consistent this season but Ross Kilvington believes that will lead to a goal-laden clash at Stamford Bridge on Saturday

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs. Brighton: Head-to-head record and past meetings
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the head-to-head record and previous meetings between Chelsea and Brighton & Hove Albion.
